page.content:
{rule:floating frames}
Linux *****
Contains OpenAMQ binaries, libraries, documentation, and tools ready to use for Linux:
- [/pub/OpenAMQ-$(main_version)-linux.tar.gz:OpenAMQ for Linux]
1. Untar the package. 2. Run ./install script. 3. Run amq_server. 4. Run amq_client to test.
More: [page:deploy]
Solaris *******
Contains OpenAMQ binaries, libraries, documentation, and tools ready to use for Solaris:
- [/pub/OpenAMQ-$(main_version)-solaris.tar.gz:OpenAMQ for Solaris 10]
1. Untar the package. 2. Run ./install script. 3. Run amq_server. 4. Run amq_client to test.
More: [page:deploy]
Windows *******
Contains OpenAMQ binaries, libraries, documentation, and tools ready to use for Windows:
- [/pub/OpenAMQ-$(main_version)-win32.exe:OpenAMQ for Windows]
1. Run self-installing executable. 2. Run amq_server. 3. Run amq_client to test.
More: [page:deploy]
Other Unix **********
This package contains the full OpenAMQ source code for Linux, Solaris, and Unix systems. Building from source gives you the most control over the results you get:
1. [/pub/OpenAMQ-$(main_version).tar.gz:Download tar.gz (9Mb)]. 2. [/build_posix.html:Step-by-step instructions].
More: [page:build]
Windows Sources ***************
This package contains the full OpenAMQ source code for Windows. Building from source gives you the most control over the results you get:
1. [/pub/OpenAMQ-$(main_version).zip:Download zip (10Mb)]. 2. [/build_win32.html:Step-by-step instructions].
More: [page:build]
Information ***********
To run the OpenAMQ server you need no other packages.
To build OpenAMQ you need a modern ANSI C compiler and libraries.
To use OpenAMQ in applications you need the OpenAMQ WireAPI libraries (included).
More: [page:library]
